Name: Alexander's Big Brother
Ingredients: 5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
7.5 ml Egg white (pasteurised) or 																																			Aquafaba (chickpea water)																								 or 3 dashes Fee Brothers Fee Foam cocktail foamer optional
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker.
Garnish with physalis (cape gooseberry) on rim.
Review: Orangey in taste and creamy blue in colour - mildly better than creamy pink for the macho out there.
History: An orange-inspired version of the coriginal gin-based Alexander and the popular Brandy Alexander .
Nutrition: One serving of Alexander's Big Brother contains 216 calories
